content: lion brand pattern # w50589 corrections applied aug 3 2005 *clsu-pradahat pdf september 2005 * skill level intermediate level 3 lion® suede article #210 *discontinued* 2 colors 122 yards each crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm gauge 2 shells + 3 row = 2 inches \ 5 cm over shell pattern rounds 8-10 the shaping of this hat seems unusual but will ultimately make hat as photographed worked in rounds from the top down also available on joann com p408260 lion brand famous designer hat 1 knit version famous designer hat knit 2 *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www joann com/lion-brand-famous-designer-hat/p408260 html 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/famous-designer-hat-knit
